question: SEO mein Title Tag ke liye recommended character limit kya hai?
options: 50-60 characters
100-120 characters
120-150 characters
50 se kam characters
answer: 50-60 characters

question: Meta Description ka mukhya uddeshya kya hai?
options: SERPs mein page ka chhota sa summary dena
Page ke mukhya keywords ki list dena
Page ka main heading dikhana
Homepage ka link dena
answer: SERPs mein page ka chhota sa summary dena

question: Ek page par behtareen SEO practice ke liye kitne H1 tags hone chahiye?
options: Sirf ek H1 tag
Do H1 tags
Jitne aap chahein
Kam se kam teen H1 tags
answer: Sirf ek H1 tag

question: URL structure ke liye kaun sa accha practice hai?
options: Shabdon ko alag karne ke liye hyphens ka upyog karna
Shabdon ko alag karne ke liye underscores ka upyog karna
Lambe aur jatil URLs ka upyog karna
URLs mein random characters ka upyog karna
answer: Shabdon ko alag karne ke liye hyphens ka upyog karna

question: Image Alt Tag ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Search engines ke liye image ka text description dena
Image ko background ke roop mein set karna
Image ka size define karna
Image par border lagana
answer: Search engines ke liye image ka text description dena

question: Quality content ke liye recommended minimum word count kya hai?
options: Kam se kam 1000+ shabd
Kam se kam 500 shabd
Kam se kam 2000 shabd
Kam se kam 300 shabd
answer: Kam se kam 1000+ shabd

question: Internal linking ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Apni website ke doosre pages se link karna
Bahari websites se link karna
Social media pages se link karna
Downloadable files se link karna
answer: Apni website ke doosre pages se link karna

question: Link mein 'nofollow' attribute ka kya matlab hai?
options: Ki search engine crawlers us link ko follow na karein
Ki link toota hua hai
Ki link ek internal link hai
Ki link ek high-authority link hai
answer: Ki search engine crawlers us link ko follow na karein

question: Backlinks banane ke liye kaun sa accha source hai?
options: High-authority blogs par guest posting karna
Spammy directories se links khareedna
Apraasangik websites se link karna
Automated link-building software ka upyog karna
answer: High-authority blogs par guest posting karna

question: Off-Page SEO mein social signals ka kya mahatva hai?
options: Ve brand visibility aur engagement badhane mein madad karte hain
Ve seedhe search engine rankings mein sudhar karte hain
Ve Google ke liye ek ranking factor hain
Ve adhik backlinks prapt karne mein madad karte hain
answer: Ve brand visibility aur engagement badhane mein madad karte hain

question: Local SEO ka prathmik focus kya hai?
options: Ek sthaaneey darshakon ke liye website ko optimize karna
Ek vaishvik darshakon ke liye website ko optimize karna
Mobile devices ke liye website ko optimize karna
Voice search ke liye website ko optimize karna
answer: Ek sthaaneey darshakon ke liye website ko optimize karna

question: sitemap.xml file ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Search engines ko aapki website crawl aur index karne mein madad karna
Search engines ko aapki website crawl karne se rokna
Aapki website par sabhi toote hue links ki list dena
Aapki website par sabhi images ki list dena
answer: Search engines ko aapki website crawl aur index karne mein madad karna

question: robots.txt file ki kya bhoomika hai?
options: Search engine crawlers ko batana ki ve aapki site se kaun se page ya file request kar sakte hain ya nahi
Aapki website ke liye sabhi keywords ki list dena
Search engines ko aapki website ka map pradan karna
Users ko sahi page par svachaalit roop se redirect karna
answer: Search engine crawlers ko batana ki ve aapki site se kaun se page ya file request kar sakte hain ya nahi

question: Canonical tags ka upyog karne ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Duplicate content samasyaon se bachne ke liye ek page ka pasandeeda version nirdisht karna
Alag-alag kshetron ke liye ek page ki copy banana
Ek page ke alag version se link karna
Ek page ko search engines se chipana
answer: Duplicate content samasyaon se bachne ke liye ek page ka pasandeeda version nirdisht karna

question: SEO ke liye SSL certificate (HTTPS) ka kya mahatva hai?
options: Yeh Google ke liye ek ranking signal hai aur website suraksha mein sudhar karta hai
Yeh Google ke liye ranking signal nahi hai
Yeh keval e-commerce websites ke liye aavashyak hai
Yeh website ki speed ko dheema kar deta hai
answer: Yeh Google ke liye ek ranking signal hai aur website suraksha mein sudhar karta hai

question: Core Web Vitals kya hain?
options: Ek page ki speed, responsiveness, aur visual stability se sambandhit metrics ka ek set
Ek page ke backlinks ki sankhya se sambandhit metrics ka ek set
Ek page ke keyword density se sambandhit metrics ka ek set
Ek page ke social shares se sambandhit metrics ka ek set
answer: Ek page ki speed, responsiveness, aur visual stability se sambandhit metrics ka ek set

question: Ek acche user experience ke liye aadarsh LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) score kya hai?
options: 2.5 second se kam
4 second se kam
1 second se kam
5 second se kam
answer: 2.5 second se kam

question: Ek acche user experience ke liye aadarsh FID (First Input Delay) score kya hai?
options: 100 millisecond se kam
200 millisecond se kam
50 millisecond se kam
300 millisecond se kam
answer: 100 millisecond se kam

question: Ek acche user experience ke liye aadarsh CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift) score kya hai?
options: 0.1 se kam
0.5 se kam
0.2 se kam
1 se kam
answer: 0.1 se kam

question: Website ke performance aur SEO issues ko check karne ke liye kaun sa tool istemal kiya ja sakta hai?
options: Google Search Console
Google Analytics
Google Keyword Planner
Google Trends
answer: Google Search Console

question: Keyword research ke liye mukhya roop se kaun sa tool istemal kiya jata hai?
options: Google Keyword Planner
Google Search Console
Google Analytics
Google Trends
answer: Google Keyword Planner

question: Neil Patel ke Ubersuggest ka mukhya kaam kya hai?
options: Keyword research, site audit, aur backlink analysis
Website hosting aur domain registration
Website content banana aur edit karna
Website traffic aur user behavior ki nigrani karna
answer: Keyword research, site audit, aur backlink analysis

question: Kaun sa tool yah pata lagane mein madad karta hai ki log kisi vishay par kya search kar rahe hain?
options: Answer The Public
Google Trends
Google Keyword Planner
Ubersuggest
answer: Answer The Public

question: On-page SEO analysis ke liye nimnlikhit mein se kaun sa free Chrome extension hai?
options: SEO Minion
Ahrefs
SEMrush
Moz
answer: SEO Minion

question: SEO content ke liye Grammarly ya Hemingway Editor ka upyog karne ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Content ko adhik padhne योग्य aur vyakaran-proof banana
Content ke liye keywords dhundhna
Content ka backlink profile check karna
Pratiyogi ke content ka vishleshan karna
answer: Content ko adhik padhne योग्य aur vyakaran-proof banana

question: Schema Markup kya hai?
options: Code jo search engines ko aapke content ko behtar tarike se samajhne mein madad karta hai
Website ki speed check karne ka ek tool
Ek prakaar ka backlink
Keyword stuffing ka ek tarika
answer: Code jo search engines ko aapke content ko behtar tarike se samajhne mein madad karta hai

question: Schema Markup lagoo karne ke liye aam taur par kaun sa format istemal kiya jata hai?
options: JSON-LD
HTML
CSS
XML
answer: JSON-LD

question: On-Page SEO ka prathmik lakshya kya hai?
options: Individual web pages ko rank mein upar laane ke liye optimize karna
Doosri websites se backlinks banana
Social media par content promote karna
Website server performance mein sudhar karna
answer: Individual web pages ko rank mein upar laane ke liye optimize karna

question: 'Keyword stuffing' kya hai?
options: Rankings mein herapheri karne ke liye ek webpage ko keywords se bhar dena
Content mein स्वाभाविक roop se प्रासंगिक keywords ka upyog karna
Ek vishay ke liye sabse acche keywords par research karna
Meta description mein keywords daalna
answer: Rankings mein herapheri karne ke liye ek webpage ko keywords se bhar dena

question: Mobile optimization SEO ke liye kyon mahatvapurna hai?
options: Google mobile-first indexing ka upyog karta hai
Yah website ko desktop par tezi se load karta hai
Yah backlinks prapt karne ke liye ek aavashyakta hai
Yah behtar content banane mein madad karta hai
answer: Google mobile-first indexing ka upyog karta hai

question: '301 redirect' kya hai?
options: Ek URL se doosre par ek sthayi redirect
Ek URL se doosre par ek asthayi redirect
Ek redirect jo 404 error page ki or le jata hai
Ek redirect jo search engines dwara block kiya gaya hai
answer: Ek URL se doosre par ek sthayi redirect

question: Local SEO ke sandarbh mein 'NAP' ka kya arth hai?
options: Naam, Pata, Phone Number
Naya, Sakriya, Lokpriya
Navigation, Sugamta, Pradarshan
Notes, Lekh, Prakashan
answer: Naam, Pata, Phone Number

question: 'Broken Link Building' kya hai?
options: Doosri sites par toote hue links dhundhna aur apne link ko badlav ke roop mein sujhana
Apni website par toote hue links ko theek karna
Jaan boojhkar toote hue links banana
Doosri websites se toote hue links khareedna
answer: Doosri sites par toote hue links dhundhna aur apne link ko badlav ke roop mein sujhana

question: Pratiyogi backlink vishleshan ke liye kaun sa tool istemal kiya jata hai?
options: Ahrefs, SEMrush, ya Ubersuggest
Google Analytics
Google Search Console
Google Keyword Planner
answer: Ahrefs, SEMrush, ya Ubersuggest

question: CDN (Content Delivery Network) ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: User ke nazdeeki servers se content vitarit karke website ki speed mein sudhar karna
Website content banana aur prabandhit karna
Website traffic aur user behavior ki nigrani karna
Doosri websites se backlinks banana
answer: User ke nazdeeki servers se content vitarit karke website ki speed mein sudhar karna

question: 'Lazy loading' kya hai?
options: Ek takneek jahan images tabhi load hoti hain jab ve screen par dikhne wali hoti hain
Poore webpage ko ek saath load karne ki ek vidhi
Images ko unke file size ko kam karne ke liye compress karne ka ek tarika
Search engines se content chipane ki ek takneek
answer: Ek takneek jahan images tabhi load hoti hain jab ve screen par dikhne wali hoti hain

question: Structured data ka upyog karne ka mukhya laabh kya hai?
options: Yah aapki site ko rich results, jaise snippets aur carousels mein dikhne mein madad kar sakta hai
Yah Google par top ranking ki guarantee deta hai
Yah svachaalit roop se aapki site par backlinks banata hai
Yah aapki website ke design aur layout mein sudhar karta hai
answer: Yah aapki site ko rich results, jaise snippets aur carousels mein dikhne mein madad kar sakta hai

question: Nimnlikhit mein se kaun sa user engagement signal ka udaharan hai?
options: Page par bitaya gaya samay
Backlinks ki sankhya
Keyword density
Website loading speed
answer: Page par bitaya gaya samay

question: Off-page SEO mein press release ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Brand visibility haasil karna aur sambhavतः samachar sites se backlinks prapt karna
Seedhe utpaadon ya sevaon ko bechna
Website ke internal linking structure mein sudhar karna
Website par toote hue links ko theek karna
answer: Brand visibility haasil karna aur sambhavतः samachar sites se backlinks prapt karna

question: 'Brand mention' kya hai?
options: Jab aapke brand ka online ullekh kiya jata hai, bhale hi link na ho
Ek doosri website se aapki website ka link
Ek keyword jismein aapka brand naam shamil hai
Aapke brand ke baare mein ek social media post
answer: Jab aapke brand ka online ullekh kiya jata hai, bhale hi link na ho

question: Ek saaf URL structure hona kyon mahatvapurna hai?
options: Yah users aur search engines dono ke liye samajhne mein aasan hai
Yah HTTPS ka upyog karne ke liye ek aavashyakta hai
Yah svachaalit roop se website ki speed mein sudhar karta hai
Yah behtar content banane mein madad karta hai
answer: Yah users aur search engines dono ke liye samajhne mein aasan hai

question: Google My Business ka mukhya uddeshya kya hai?
options: Google par apni online upasthiti ka prabandhan karna, jismein Search aur Maps shamil hain
Online utpaadon ko khareedna aur bechna
Website content banana aur edit karna
Website traffic aur user behavior ki nigrani karna
answer: Google par apni online upasthiti ka prabandhan karna, jismein Search aur Maps shamil hain

question: 'Duplicate content' kya hai?
options: Jab ek hi ya saman content kai URLs par dikhai deta hai
Content jo doosri website se copy kiya gaya hai
Content jo kai bhashaon mein likha gaya hai
Content jo keywords ke liye optimize nahi hai
answer: Jab ek hi ya saman content kai URLs par dikhai deta hai

question: Aap duplicate content samasyaon ko kaise theek kar sakte hain?
options: Canonical tags ya 301 redirects ka upyog karke
Duplicate pages ko delete karke
Duplicate pages ko crawl hone se rok kar
Duplicate pages ka title badal kar
answer: Canonical tags ya 301 redirects ka upyog karke

question: '404 error' page ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Users ko soochit karna ki anurodhit page nahi mil saka
Users ko homepage par redirect karna
Users ko website tak pahunchne se rokna
Website par sabhi pages ki list dikhana
answer: Users ko soochit karna ki anurodhit page nahi mil saka

question: Website par toote hue links dhundhne ke liye kaun sa tool istemal kiya ja sakta hai?
options: Screaming Frog ya Ahrefs
Google Analytics
Google Search Console
Google Keyword Planner
answer: Screaming Frog ya Ahrefs

question: Technical SEO ka mukhya lakshya kya hai?
options: Search engine spiders ko ek site ko adhik prabhavi dhang se crawl aur index karne mein madad karna
Ek website ke liye uchch-gunवत्ता wala content banana
Doosri websites se backlinks banana
Social media par ek website ka prachar karna
answer: Search engine spiders ko ek site ko adhik prabhavi dhang se crawl aur index karne mein madad karna

question: Ek responsive theme ka upyog karne ka kya laabh hai?
options: Yah sunishchit karta hai ki aapki website sabhi devices par acchi dikhe, jismein desktops, tablets, aur smartphones shamil hain
Yah svachaalit roop se aapki site par backlinks banata hai
Yah aapki website ke keyword rankings mein sudhar karta hai
Yah behtar content banane mein madad karta hai
answer: Yah sunishchit karta hai ki aapki website sabhi devices par acchi dikhe, jismein desktops, tablets, aur smartphones shamil hain

question: Yah test karne ke liye kaun sa tool istemal kiya ja sakta hai ki koi website mobile-friendly hai ya nahi?
options: Google Mobile-Friendly Test
Google Analytics
Google Search Console
Google Keyword Planner
answer: Google Mobile-Friendly Test

question: 'Caching' kya hai?
options: Files ki copies ko ek temporary storage location mein store karna taki unhe tezi se serve kiya ja sake
Backlinks banane ka ek tarika
Pratiyogi websites ka vishleshan karne ka ek tarika
SEO-friendly content likhne ki ek takneek
answer: Files ki copies ko ek temporary storage location mein store karna taki unhe tezi se serve kiya ja sake

question: JS aur CSS files ko minify karne ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Unke file size ko kam karna aur website loading speed mein sudhar karna
Unhe developers ke liye padhne mein aasan banana
Files mein adhik keywords jodna
Code ko pratiyogiyon se chipana
answer: Unke file size ko kam karna aur website loading speed mein sudhar karna

question: 'SERP' kya hai?
options: Search Engine Results Page
Search Engine Ranking Position
Search Engine Related Pages
Search Engine Ranking Program
answer: Search Engine Results Page

question: 'LSI keywords' kya hain?
options: Latent Semantic Indexing keywords, jo mukhya keyword se vaicharik roop se sambandhit shabd hain
Long-tail keywords jo atyadhik vishisht hain
Keywords jo galat spelling wale hain
Keywords jo users se chipaye gaye hain
answer: Latent Semantic Indexing keywords, jo mukhya keyword se vaicharik roop se sambandhit shabd hain

question: 'Rich snippet' kya hai?
options: Atirikt data ke saath pradarshit ek samanya Google search result
Ek search result jo page ke bilkul upar dikhai deta hai
Ek search result jiske liye bhugtan kiya gaya hai
Ek search result jismein ek image shamil hai
answer: Atirikt data ke saath pradarshit ek samanya Google search result

question: 'Disavow tool' ka kya uddeshya hai?
options: Google se apni site ke kuch backlinks ko ignore karne ke liye kehna
Naye backlink avसर dhundhna
Apne pratiyogiyon ke backlinks ka vishleshan karna
Apni site par svachaalit roop se backlinks banana
answer: Google se apni site ke kuch backlinks ko ignore karne ke liye kehna

question: 'Anchor text' kya hai?
options: Ek hyperlink mein clickable text
Jab aap ek link par hover karte hain to dikhne wala text
Ek image ka varnan karne wala text
Ek page ka mukhya heading
answer: Ek hyperlink mein clickable text

question: 'Domain authority' kya hai?
options: Ek search engine ranking score jo bhavishवाणी karta hai ki ek website SERPs par kitna accha rank karegi
Ek domain ki aayu
Ek website par pages ki sankhya
Ek website jin keywords ke liye rank karti hai unki sankhya
answer: Ek search engine ranking score jo bhavishवाणी karta hai ki ek website SERPs par kitna accha rank karegi

question: 'Page authority' kya hai?
options: Ek score jo bhavishवाणी karta hai ki ek vishisht page SERPs par kitna accha rank karega
Ek page par shabdon ki sankhya
Ek page par images ki sankhya
Ek page par internal links ki sankhya
answer: Ek score jo bhavishवाणी karta hai ki ek vishisht page SERPs par kitna accha rank karega

question: 'Long-tail keyword' kya hai?
options: Ek keyword phrase jo ek adhik samanya keyword se lamba aur adhik vishisht hai
Ek keyword jo teen shabdon se kam lamba hai
Ek keyword jo atyadhik pratispardhi hai
Ek keyword jo content se प्रासंगिक nahi hai
answer: Ek keyword phrase jo ek adhik samanya keyword se lamba aur adhik vishisht hai

question: 'PPC' kya hai?
options: Pay-per-click, internet marketing ka ek model jismein vigyapan data har baar unke ek vigyapan par click hone par shulk ka bhugtan karte hain
Page-per-click, website traffic mapne ke liye ek metric
Price-per-click, ek vigyapan par ek click ki lagat
People-per-click, ek vigyapan par click karne wale logon ki sankhya
answer: Pay-per-click, internet marketing ka ek model jismein vigyapan data har baar unke ek vigyapan par click hone par shulk ka bhugtan karte hain

question: SEO aur SEM mein kya antar hai?
options: SEO SEM (Search Engine Marketing) ka ek hissa hai, jismein bhugtan kiye gaye vigyapan bhi shamil hain
SEO aur SEM ek hi cheez hain
SEO bhugtan kiye gaye vigyapan ke baare mein hai, jabki SEM organic traffic ke baare mein hai
SEO social media ke liye hai, jabki SEM search engines ke liye hai
answer: SEO SEM (Search Engine Marketing) ka ek hissa hai, jismein bhugtan kiye gaye vigyapan bhi shamil hain

question: 'Crawler' ya 'spider' kya hai?
options: Search engines dwara web pages ko khojne aur index karne ke liye istemal kiya jane wala ek bot
Ek website par toote hue links dhundhne ke liye ek tool
Backlinks banane ke liye ek program
Ek prakaar ka malware jo ek website ko nuksan pahuncha sakta hai
answer: Search engines dwara web pages ko khojne aur index karne ke liye istemal kiya jane wala ek bot

question: 'Indexing' kya hai?
options: Web pages ko Google ke database mein jodna
Ek website ke liye sitemap banana
Ek website ko mobile devices ke liye optimize karna
Ek website par backlinks banana
answer: Web pages ko Google ke database mein jodna

question: 'Ranking' kya hai?
options: Search engine results page par ek website ki sthiti
Ek website par aagantukon ki sankhya
Ek website par backlinks ki sankhya
Ek website ki aayu
answer: Search engine results page par ek website ki sthiti

question: 'Meta keyword' tag kya hai?
options: Ek tag jo kabhi ek page ke liye keywords pradan karne ke liye istemal kiya jata tha, lekin ab search engines dwara bade paimane par andekha kiya jata hai
Ek tag jo ek page ke mukhya keyword ko paribhashit karne ke liye istemal kiya jata hai
Ek tag jo users se keywords chipane ke liye istemal kiya jata hai
Ek tag jo ek page ke liye keywords ki list banane ke liye istemal kiya jata hai
answer: Ek tag jo kabhi ek page ke liye keywords pradan karne ke liye istemal kiya jata tha, lekin ab search engines dwara bade paimane par andekha kiya jata hai

question: 'Black hat SEO' kya hai?
options: Anaitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka ullanghan karti hain
Naitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka palan karti hain
SEO takneekein jo ab prabhavi nahi hain
SEO takneekein jo keval badi companiyon dwara istemal ki jati hain
answer: Anaitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka ullanghan karti hain

question: 'White hat SEO' kya hai?
options: Naitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka palan karti hain
Anaitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka ullanghan karti hain
SEO takneekein jo purani ho chuki hain
SEO takneekein jo keval e-commerce websites ke liye istemal ki jati hain
answer: Naitik SEO takneekein jo search engine dishanirdeshon ka palan karti hain

question: 'Gray hat SEO' kya hai?
options: SEO takneekein jo white hat aur black hat vidhiyon ka mishran hain
SEO takneekein jo abhi tak white hat ya black hat ke roop mein vargikrit nahi hain
SEO takneekein jo keval thode samay ke liye istemal ki jati hain
SEO takneekein jo prabhavi nahi hain
answer: SEO takneekein jo white hat aur black hat vidhiyon ka mishran hain

question: 'Google penalty' kya hai?
options: Google ke ranking algorithms mein update ya manual samiksha ke आधार par ek site ki search rankings par nakaratmak prabhav
Ek shulk jo Google ko unke dishanirdeshon ka ullanghan karne ke liye bhugtan karna hoga
Sambhavit SEO muddon ke baare mein Google se ek chetavani
Google ke search results se ek asthayi pratibandh
answer: Google ke ranking algorithms mein update ya manual samiksha ke आधार par ek site ki search rankings par nakaratmak prabhav

question: 'Link juice' kya hai?
options: Links ke madhyam se ek page ya site se doosre mein paarit moolya ya equity
Ek page par links ki sankhya
Ek page par content ki gunvatta
Ek link ki aayu
answer: Links ke madhyam se ek page ya site se doosre mein paarit moolya ya equity

question: 'Silo structure' kya hai?
options: Sambandhit pages ko ek saath samuhit karne ke liye ek website ke content ko vyavasthit karne ka ek tarika
Backlinks banane ka ek tarika
SEO-friendly content likhne ki ek takneek
Pratiyogi websites ka vishleshan karne ka ek tarika
answer: Sambandhit pages ko ek saath samuhit karne ke liye ek website ke content ko vyavasthit karne ka ek tarika

question: 'Voice search optimization' kya hai?
options: Apne content ko voice search results mein dikhane ke liye optimize karna
Apne content ke audio version banana
Apni website ka prabandhan karne ke liye voice commands ka upyog karna
Apni website mein voice search feature jodna
answer: Apne content ko voice search results mein dikhane ke liye optimize karna

question: SEO mein 'E-A-T' kya hai?
options: Visheshagyata, Pradhikaran, aur Vishvasniyata
Sagai, Pradhikaran, aur Traffic
Utkrishtata, Pramanikta, aur Pardarshita
Dakshata, Sateekta, aur Samaybaddhata
answer: Visheshagyata, Pradhikaran, aur Vishvasniyata
